over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ glossary of terms chain chain increase increase 2 stitches in one space assume all increases are single_crochet increases unless otherwise specified oc original chain this refers to the very first set of chain stitches you made to start the piece you re working on single_crochet single_crochet insert your hook into the next available stitch yarn over pull up yarn over pull through all 2 loops spiral when instructions note to work in a spiral you should work in the round without joining for these row do not slip_stitch chain 1 join at the end of each row st stitch yo yarn over foreword this pattern is dedicated to all the members of my fb group thank you for being amazing this is for you for community support questions or to share photos of works in progress or finished objects join https //www facebook com/groups/craftyintentionscommunity/ there is a subreddit here https //www reddit com/r/craftyintentions/ and a discord channel here https //discord com/invite/uvv5tcznbx for more information about crafty intentions go here http //www craftyintentions com for related video tutorials from crafty intentions go here https //www youtube com/@craftyintentions for more patterns by crafty intentions go here https //shop craftyintentions com/ or here https //www ravelry com/designers/crafty-intentions or here https //www etsy com/shop/craftyintentions © 2024 megan lapp crafty intentions all rights
